skills.skill: Okta, Duo, or other MFA Solutions
Jira, Confluence, Slack, Google Apps, MS Office for Mac and PCs, Zendesk

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide world-class IT customer service and support to Meraki employees.
Cover the walk-up desk to gather information and troubleshoot hardware and software issues.
Respond to service desk tickets and provide support for reported customer problems.
Triage and resolve support requests from internal ticketing and chat systems.
Create commercial invoices and shipping labels for laptops.
Document solutions, build how-to guides, and maintain documentation.
Collaborate with the IT Admins in San Francisco on projects related to enhancing the employee support experience.
Note trending problems and work with IT leadership to find and fix root causes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
